Name: Eric Brown
AboutMe:
By Day: A software engineer working for Paylocity working on innovative web applications.

By Night: A father, husband and, a penetration tester. I'm extremely passionate about Info-Sec/Cyber Security. I enjoy exercising my coding skills to help with my work in the info-sec field. Specifically exploits, utilities (I.E: Key logger, etc..), Worms and Viruses. All to learn how to utilize my skills to help protect my clients. Yes, I dawn the white hat. :)

What have I been up to lately: Teaching my daughter how to program and continuing to learn more about being a better penetration tester while also starting to learn reverse engineering and computer forensics.

Current Goals:

  1. Acquire the CEH (Certified Ethical Hacker) certificate.
  2. Acquire the ECSA/LPT (Certified Security Analyst/Licensed Pen Tester) certificates.
  3. Acquire the CHFI (Certified Computer Hacking Forensic Investigator) certificate.
  4. Acquire the CCISO (Certified Chief Information Security Officer) certificate.
  5. Acquire the ECIH (Certified Incident Handler) certificate.
  6. Acquire the ECSP (Certified Secure Programmer for .NET) certificate.
  7. Turn my daughter into an awesome programmer.
